title: Strengthening Clinical Practical Competencies: Instructional Design Scenarios for Repetitive Strain Injury Prevention Exercise Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basics of exercise physiology, ergonomic workplace understanding, and awareness of RSI (Repetitive Strain Injury) mechanisms
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can accurately identify and distinguish RSI prevention exercises presented in three information formats (text/image/video) with 85% accuracy
Learners can measure exercise learning time across video/image/text media and evaluate optimal learning methods through a 3-step decision-making process to produce assessment reports
Learners can achieve over 70% accuracy in RSI prevention exercise execution during formative assessments and demonstrate corrected implementation methods incorporating real-time feedback
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
